body.raw:
{
    "method": "CreateObjects",
    "id": "2",
    "params": [{
        "Ticket": "{{Current_Ticket}}",
        "Lock": false,
        "Objects":[{
            "Object": {
                "MetaData": {
                  "BasicMetaData": {
                  "ID": null,
                  "DocumentID": null,
                  "Name": "test article",
                  "Type": "Article",
                  "Publication": {
                    "Id": "25",
                    "Name": "WoodWing"
                  },
                  "Category": null,
                  "MasterId": null,
                  "StoryId": null,
                  "__classname__": "BasicMetaData"
                },
                "RightsMetaData": {
                  "CopyrightMarked": false,
                  "Copyright": null,
                  "CopyrightURL": null,
                  "__classname__": "WorkflowMetaData"
                },
                "SourceMetaData": {
                  "Credit": null,
                  "Source": null,
                  "Author": null,
                  "__classname": "SourceMetaData"
                },
                "ContentMetaData": {
                  "Description": null,
                  "DescriptionAuthor": null,
                  "Keywords": [],
                  "Slugline": null,
                  "Format": null,
                  "Columns": null,
                  "Width": null,
                  "Height": null,
                  "Dpi": null,
                  "LengthWords": null,
                  "LengthChars": null,
                  "LengthParas": null,
                  "LengthLines": null,
                  "PlainContent": null,
                  "FileSize": null,
                  "ColorSpace": null,
                  "HighResFile": null,
                  "Encoding": null,
                  "Compression": null,
                  "KeyFrameEveryFrames": null,
                  "Channels": null,
                  "AspectRatio": null,
                  "Orientation": null,
                  "__classname": "ContentMetaData"
                },
                "WorkflowMetaData": {
                  "Urgency": null,
                  "Modifier": null,
                  "Modified": null,
                  "Creator": null,
                  "Created": null,
                  "Comment": "This is my comment 2",
                  "State": {
                    "Id": "328",
                    "Name": "Draft",
                    "Type": "Article",
                    "Produce": false,
                    "Color": null,
                    "DefaultRouteTo": ""
                  },
                  "RouteTo": null,
                  "LockedBy": null,
                  "Version" : null,
                  "DeadlineSoft": null,
                  "Rating": null,
                  "Deletor": null,
                  "Deleted": null,
                  "__classname__": "WorkflowMetaData"
                },
                "ExtraMetaData": null,
                  "__classname__": "MetaData"
                },
                "Relations": [],
                "Pages":[],
                "Files":[{
                  "Attachment": {
                      "Rendition": "Native",
                      "Type": "application\/ww-digital+json",
                      "Content": null,
                      "FilePath": null,
                      "FileUrl": "{{FileUploadUrl}}",
                      "EditionId": null,
                      "ContentSourceFileLink": null,
                      "ContentSourceProxyLink": null
                  }
                }],
                "Messages": [],
                "Elements": [],
                "Targets":[],
                "Renditions": [],
                "MessageList": null,
                "ObjectLabels": [],
                "InDesignArticles": [],
                "Placements": [],
                "Operations": []
            }
         }],
          "Messages": [],
          "AutoNaming": false,
          "Areas": null,
          "ReplaceGUIDs": "false",
          "__classname__": "WflCreateObjectsRequest"
    }],
    "jsonrpc": "2.0"
}

{
    "method": "CreateIssues",
    "id": "1",
    "params": [{
        "Ticket": "{{Admin_Current_Ticket}}",
        "RequestModes": [""],
        "PublicationId": "{{Publication_ID}}",
        "PubChannelId": "1",
        "Issues":[
            {
                "Name": "3rd Issue",
                "Id": null,
                "Description": "The Issue Description",
                "SortOrder": 10,
                "EmailNotify": null,
                "ReversedRead": null,
                "OverrulePublication": null,
                "Deadline": "",
                "ExpectedPages": "16",
                "Subject": "The Issue Subject",
                "Activated": true,
                "PublicationDate": "",
                "ExtraMetaData": [],
                "CalculateDeadlines": false,
                "__classname__": "AdmIssue"
            }
        ],
        "__classname__": "AdmCreateIssuesRequest"
     }],
    "jsonrpc": "2.0"
}

item.name: Digital Articles
item.description: A series of calls for creating digital articles within Studio.
